Lisa Harrow ONZM (amụrụ ya na abalị ise na onwa nke asatọ, na afọ 1943) bụ on azụrụ azụ na ihie nkiri nke New Zealand RADA, ama maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Britain, ihe nkiri na ihie onyonyo
Ma eleghị anya, a maara ya nke ọma maka ihe ngosi ya nke Nancy Astor na ihe nkiri igwe onyonyo BBC nke Britain, Nancy Astor
A mụrụ Harrow na mpaghara Auckland nke Ugwu Eden na 25 Ọgọst 1943, ada Kennedy Mayo Harrow na Eleanor Joan Harrow (née Stacpoole)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Auckland, ma mesịa gụchaa na RADA na 1968, sonyere ụlọ ọrụ BBC Radio 's Repertory Company.

Ọrụ ogbo Harrow malitere na Royal Shakespeare Company ; Ọrụ ebe ahụ gụnyere Olivia na mmepụta nke abalị iri na abụọ nke John Barton na-emegide Judi Dench, yana Portia na The Merchant nke Venice megide Patrick Stewart

Ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-eduga na ihe nkiri UK gụnyere Juliet na-emegide John Hurt 's Romeo na Belgrade Theatre na Coventry, na Ann Whitfield na Man na Superman megidere Peter O'Toole na Theater Royal, Haymarket
Harrow emeela na ogbo na America niile
Ọ weghaara ọrụ etiti Vivian Bearing na Pulitzer Prize na-emeri egwuregwu Wit na mmepụta ya na- apụ apụ-Broadway na New York City
Akpọrọ ya aha 2001 Performer of the Year na Pittsburgh maka Medea
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere: Raynevsky na The Cherry Orchard na Yale Rep na Chautauqua Theatre Company, ebe ọ na-egwuri Kate Keller na All My Sons
Ọ gbara Creusa na Washington Shakespeare Theater Company 's 3 October 2009–4/12/2009 mmepụta nke Euripides 's Ion
A maara Harrow maka ịkpọ Nancy Astor, nwanyị mbụ nọrọ oche ya na House of Commons, na ihe nkiri BBC 1982 Nancy Astor
Ọ gbara na United States na usoro PBS Masterpiece Theatre
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri Italiantali The Devil Is a Woman (1974) nke Glenda Jackson gbara
Ọzọkwa na 1976, ọ pụtara na ihe omume nke Space: 1999 dị ka Anna Davies na ' The Testament of Arkadia '
Harrow gbara Helen Alderson na mmegharị ihe nkiri nke akwụkwọ James Herriot All Creatures Great and Small (1975), na-esote Simon Ward na Anthony Hopkins
Ọ kwughachiri ọrụ ahụ n'afọ na-esote na usoro nke a ekwesịghị ime onye na-ahụ maka anụ ọkụ ọkụ, oge a na-emegide John Alderton na Colin Blakely
Harrow ọbịa-kpakpando na The Professionals dị ka onye ndụmọdụ dị egwu na-arụ ụka na Ụlọikpe nke Ajụjụ maka mgbasa nke CI5 na nkebi nke abụọ 'The Rack' (1978), nke Brian Clemens dere
Ọ gbakwara ama na usoro BBC2 1990 dị ka osote onye njikwa Lynn Blake.

Harrow gbara onye nta akụkọ Kate Reynolds na ihe nkiri egwu egwu Omen III: The Final Conflict (1981) nke na-eme Sam Neill, wee soro Neill rụkọọ ọrụ ọzọ na ihe nkiri Krzysztof Zanussi From a Far Country [ya]
Ọ gbara egwu na ihe nkiri New Zealand Shaker Run na afọ 1985 ma kpọọ Lizzie Dickinson na usoro BBC Lizzie's Pictures (1987)
Ọ meriri ma nweta ihe nrite ihe nkiri Australia maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu maka arụmọrụ ya na Thebọchị Ikpeazụ nke Chez Nous (1992)

Na 1990, Harrow gbara nwunye tart, gbachie nwunye ya nkiti n'ime ezinụlọ aghụghọ nke ndị na-emepụta ihe bara ọgaranya na Sins nke Nna, Episode 13 nke usoro Inspector Morse maka ITV, nke John Thaw na-eme
Na afọ ahụ, ọ gbakwara ama na mmegharị ABC-TV obere ihie omume nke biara na Spinner, wee rụọ ọrụ Imogen Donahue na Agatha Christie's Poirot 'The Kidnapped Prime Minister'
Ihe omume onyonyo ya kacha ọhụrụ na Britain bụ nwunye Kavanagh Lizzie na usoro Kavanagh QC, na-egosikwa Thaw
Ọ hapụrụ mmemme ahụ mgbe usoro nke atọ gasịrị (ebufere na afo1997) ịkwaga America
ụkọ Kate Reynolds na ihe nkiri e u Omen III: The Final Conflict (1981) nke na-eme Sam Neill, wee soro Neill r ụọ ọrụ ọzọ na ihe nkiri Krzysztof Zanussi From a Far Country [ ya ]

Ọ gbara egwu na ihe nkiri New Zealand Shaker Run na 1985 ma kpọọ Lizzie Dickinson na usoro BBC Lizzie's Pictures (1987O nwetala ihie nrite na ma ihe nkiri Australia maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu maka arụmọrụ ya na Thebọchị Ikpeazụ nke Chez Nous (1992)
Na 1990, Harrow na-egwuri egwu tart, na-eleghara nwunye anya na ezinụlọ aghụghọ nke ndị na-emepụta ọgaranya na Sins of the Father, Episode 13 nke Inspector Morse series for ITV, starring John Thaw
N'afọ ahụ, o nwekwara starred na ABC-TV miniseries mmegharị nke Bịa na Spinner, na-egwuri ọrụ nke Imogen Donahue na Agatha Christie's Poirot ' The Kidnapped Prime Minister '
Ihe omume telivishọn ya kacha ọhụrụ na Britain bụ nwunye Kavanagh Lizzie na usoro Kavanagh QC, na-egosikwa Thaw
Ọ hapụrụ mmemme ahụ mgbe usoro nke atọ gasịrị (ebufere na 1997) ịkwaga America.
Na afọ 2014, ọ gbara Marion na usoro igwe onyonyo nkiri New Zealand Step Dave
Na afọ 2015 Nkwanye Ùgwù afọ Ọhụrụ, a họpụtara Harrow ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke New Zealand Order of Merit maka ọrụ na nkà dị egwu
Harrow na Sam Neill nwere mmekọrịta na afọ 1980s
A mụrụ nwa ha nwoke Tim na afọ1983.
Ugbu a ọ lụrụ onye ọkà mmụta ihe banyere whale Roger Payne, ma biri na Vermont, US
Payne bụ onye nchoputa na Onye isi oche nke Ocean Alliance

Ya na Scott McVay chọpụtara ogologo, mgbagwoju anya na o doro anya na ụda enweghị usoro nke nwoke humpback whales na-emepụta bụ n'ezie rhythmic, usoro ugboro ugboro, ya mere, a na-akpọ ya nke ọma ' abụ whale '
Di na nwunye a emepụtala nkuzi/mmebe ihe omume akpọrọ "SeaChange: Reversing the Tide"
Harrow bụ onye dere akwụkwọ ntuziaka gburugburu ebe obibi Gịnị ka m ga-eme?, nke e bipụtara na mbipụta dị iche iche maka Australia, New Zealand, UK na United States
O nwere weebụsaịtị iji kwalite akwụkwọ ahụ
Mbipụta US:
Na afọ 2015 nkwanye ukwu afọ ọhụrụ, a họpụtara Harrow dika onye ọrụ nke New Zealand Order of Merit, maka ọrụ na nkà dị egwu
